SELECT CATEGORY_CODE , CATEGORY_NAME , REF_CATEGORY_CODE FROM CATEGORY_TABLE ORDER BY 1
SELECT A.CARD_CODE , A.CARD_BANK , A.CARD_DISCOUNT , A.CARDABLE FROM CARD_TABLE A;
INSERT INTO ORDER_TABLE A ( A.ORDER_CODE , A.ORDER_DATE , A.TOTAL_PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER_CODE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? );
INSERT INTO PAYMENT_TABLE A ( A.ORDER_CODE , A.USER_NO , A.TOTAL_PRICE , A.GRADE_NO , A.CARD_CODE , A.PAYMENT_PRICE , A.PAYMENT_BY ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? );
INSERT INTO CATEGORY_TABLE ( CATEGORY_CODE , CATEGORY_NAME , REF_CATEGORY_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_CATEGORY_CODE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
UPDATE CATEGORY_TABLE SET CATEGORY_NAME = ? , REF_CATEGORY_CODE = ? WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = ?
